source.name: Exercise 13
source.instructions: Write a stored procedure named spGetLessExpCat that accepts as an input argument an item id and outputs all the items that are in the same item category and whose price is less than that of the reference item. Output the the item id, the description, and the price of the items in DESCending order of price.
